properties.areaDesc: Union, KY; Gallatin, IL; Hardin, IL; Crittenden, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 11:05AM CST until January 20 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Kentucky...Illinois...

Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam...Shawneetown...Paducah...Olmsted Lock
and Dam...and Cairo

.Recent heavy rainfall over the lower Ohio River basin has caused river
levels to rise. Minor to moderate flooding is forecast to occur from
JT Myers Dam down to Cairo over the coming week. Crests are forecast
to occur Friday into Saturday.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Shawneetown.
* from Tuesday morning to Monday January 20.
* At 10:30 AM Sunday the stage was 31.6 feet.
* Flood Stage is 33.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Tuesday morning and continue
to rise to near 36.8 feet by Saturday afternoon.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
